text: <!channel> I've got a quick update on this to share; if you're free come down to Slate in a few minutes and we can chat about it IRL, otherwise will summarize here afterwards
tl,dr: they loved our ideas, but went with someone else.

Feedback we can incorporate for next time: It never hurts to overshare on our technical understanding of how platforms work, the process by which we make stuff for them, etc. That's stuff that can be put in a leave-behind to basically communicate we know our shit.

Silver linings: 

-opp to roll up this and other thinking on Voice in general for other projects
-"you pulled a judo move on us, nobody here knew you, and now we want to talk about partnering to help our Futures group navigate emerging tech" - client
